patthana23.14:1.1: Nakusalaṃ namicchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.14:2.1: Nakusalaṃ nasammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.14:3.1: Nakusalaṃ naaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
